title: Fury Ocean - Novel Updates
tags: Dystopia   Female Protagonist   Human Experimentation   Overpowered Protagonist
author: Noob With Old Gun   新兵扛老枪
description:
In a dystopian world, where mechas are used, subject ZERO, is a 'perfect' soldier who escapes from the military and decides to live her own way.
(The heroine is similar to Captain America, as in the use of the super soldier serum. The story is completely different however.)>
